title: Nkọwa nkenke nke nka na oghere - Temple Orbital
heading: Akụkọ dị mkpirikpi nke nka na mbara
intro: Kemgbe mmalite mbụ satịlaịtị wuru nke ọma na 1957 , ihe karịrị puku satịlaịtị iri abịala gburugburu ụwa. N'ime oge ọhụrụ a, ndị na-ese ihe achọpụtala ụzọ ha ga-esi gbasaa omume ha na oghere dị n'èzí aghọwo ụdị akwa akwa ọhụrụ. Na nke ahụ, ajụjụ ndị bụ isi gbasara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke nyocha mbara igwe bilitere - ọ bụ ezie na a ka ga-ekpuchi ọtụtụ ala ọzọ.

leonov.text: Ihe osise mbụ e kere na mbara igwe bụ ihe osise nke ọwụwa anyanwụ n'elu ụwa, nke onye Russia na-enyocha mbara igwe bụ Alexei Leonov mere mgbe ọ nọ n'ụgbọ mmiri Voskhod 2 na 1965 .
leonov.caption: Ihe osise mbụ e kere na mbara igwe, na pensụl Alexei Leonov na-ese ya. Foto: Museum of the Yuri Gagarin Cosmonaut Training Center

moonMuseum.paragraph1: Afọ atọ ka e mesịrị, Moon Museum , a miniscule seramiiki efere chere na ọ rutere na Ọnwa na ihe odide nke isii n'ime ndị a ma ama na US n'oge ahụ: Robert Rauschenberg , David Novros , John Chamberlain , Claes Oldenburg , Forrest Myers na Andy Warhol .
moonMuseum.caption1: Onyonyo nke ihe ngosi nka nke ọnwa sitere na edemede New York Times mbụ. Isi mkpịsị aka ahụ na-ekpuchi ihe osise Warhol.
moonMuseum.paragraph2: Onyinye mkpasu iwe Warhol - n'elu aka ekpe - mere ka ọrụ a bụrụ ihe ịma aka maka mgbasa ozi nkwurịta okwu n'oge ahụ.
moonMuseum.caption2: Onyonyo nke New York Times họọrọ ibipụta, yana ihe osise a na-ahụ n'okpuru ebe a na eserese Andy Warhol na akuku aka ekpe elu.

fallenAstronaut.text: Na 1971 , Apollo 15 na-enyocha mbara igwe David Scott debere obere ihe ọkpụkpụ aluminom nke mmadụ akpọrọ Fallen Astronaut na ọnwa. Onye na-ese ihe na Belgium Paul Van Hoeydonck bu n'obi, ya na mpempe a, iji cheta ndị na-agụ mbara igwe na ndị na-ahụ maka mbara igwe nwụrụ anwụ na ọganihu nke nchọpụta mbara igwe.
fallenAstronaut.caption: Nlele ihe ncheta ncheta hapụrụ na ọnwa na saịtị ọdịda Hadley-Apennine.

pioneerVoyager.text: N'afọ ndị 1970 , ma Plaques Pioneer na Voyager Probes setịpụrụ ọhụụ ọhụrụ maka nka na mbara igwe. Na-ebu plaques ọla edo-anodized aluminom nwere ozi a na-ahụ anya sitere na Ụwa gaa na ndị na-anya mbara igwe ọzọ nwere ike ịhụ ya n'ọdịnihu dị anya, ha gosipụtara ndụ mmadụ n'ime ihe ndị kachasị mkpa.
pioneerVoyager.caption: Mpempe akwụkwọ ọsụ ụzọ 10 na 11, bufere n'ime oghere miri emi na 1970s.

dove.text: Na 1990 , Brazil hapụrụ akara ya n'ókèala a na DoVE/OSCAR-17 , satịlaịtị amateur nwere ọgụgụ isi nke ike uri dị ukwuu. Ọ bụ ezie na onye kere ya ewereghị onwe ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe, ọ bụ ọrụ uri dị omimi: ọ na-edekọ ụda ụmụaka na-arịọ maka udo ma nyefee ha ihe karịrị puku abụọ redio amateurs n'ụwa nile, na-agbanwe CubeSat na-asụ ụzọ ka ọ bụrụ ọrụ ụda mkpokọta.
dove.caption: DOVE/OSCAR-17, Satịlaịtị uri Brazil na-ebufe olu ụmụaka maka udo, 1990.

lastPictures.text: N'afọ 2012 , onye na-ese ihe Trevor Paglen wepụtara "Foto Ndị Ikpeazụ" , diski micro-etched nwere foto 100 jikọtara na satịlaịtị nkwukọrịta Echostar XVI na geostationary orbit. N'ịbụ nke e mere ka ọ dịruo ọtụtụ ijeri afọ, e bu n'obi mee ka mmepeanya mmadụ gwụchaa dị ka ihe arịa ndị mgbe ochie maka ọdịnihu dị anya.
lastPictures.caption: Eserese Ikpeazụ, diski micro-etched nke emere ka ọ dị ogologo karịa mmadụ, ewepụtara na 2012.

ulises.text: Na 2015 , Colectivo Espacial Mexicano (Mexican Space Collective) malitere Ulises I , nanosatellite tụụrụ ime dị ka opera echiche n'okpuru nduzi nke onye na-ese ihe Juan José Díaz Infante Casasús . Ejiri satịlaịtị ahụ gaa na stratosphere na balloon n'oge Feria del Libro de Guadalajara. Ezubere ka ọ gbawaa ihe dịka awa anọ wee jiri parachute gbadata.
ulises.caption: Ulises I, ihe ngosi satịlaịtị opera sitere na Colectivo Espacial Mexicano.

artsat.text: Ọ bụghị ruo n'afọ 2014 ka ewepụtara satịlaịtị nke mbụ nwere nka. Ihe oru mbuso agha nke ARTSAT-1 nke Mahadum Tokyo zipụrụ data gbasara mbara ụwa nke ejiri nrụnye nka na ihe okike egwu.
artsat.caption1: ARTSAT-1 Onye mwakpo na akụkụ mapụtara nke fọdụrụ n'ụwa.
artsat.caption2: ozi [SPACE x ART] - gafere ihe ngosi Cosmologies emere na Museum of Contemporary Art Tokyo

kac.text: Onye Brazil na onye America na-ese ihe n'oge a bụ Eduardo Kac enyela aka na nka mbara igwe site na mmekorita ya na NASA na SpaceX . Ya "Telescope Inner" ( 2017 ), nke e kere ya na onye France na-enyocha mbara igwe bụ Thomas Pesquet , rụpụtara ihe ọkpụkpụ mere n'ime ọdụ ụgbọ elu International .
kac.caption: Telescope dị n'ime na ọdụ ụgbọ elu mba ụwa, nke onye France na-enyocha mbara igwe Thomas Pesquet mepụtara, 2017.

enoch.text: Na 2018 , a na-agafe agafe CubeSat wuru dị ka ọrụ nka ka ewepụtara n'ime orbit. Mepụtara site na onye na-ese ihe echiche nke Bahamian Tavares Strachan , Inọk nwere ite ọla edo 24-karat nke nwere agba nke onye mbụ na-enyocha mbara igwe nke Africa-American, Robert Henry Lawrence Jr.
enoch.caption: ENOCH (otu ngosi), 2015-2017. ⓒ Tavares Strachan, foto ⓒ Museum Associates/LACMA.

orbitalReflector.text: N'otu afọ ahụ, Trevor Paglen's Orbital Reflector ka ewepụtara dị ka ihe ọkpụkpụ nke etinyere na CubeSat na-adịghị arụ ọrụ. Ọrụ ahụ bụ ihe ngosi nka e bu n'obi gbanwee otú anyị si ele ọnọdụ anyị n'ụwa anya. Ebugara ya nke ọma. Ọ bụ ezie na ọ dịghị mgbe emepere ya dị ka e mere ya, ọ kpalitere mkparịta ụka ndị dị mkpa ma nweta nzaghachi mmetụta ọkụ sitere n'aka ndị na-enyocha mbara igwe, ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi, ndị nkụzi, ụmụ akwụkwọ, na ọha na eze n'ụwa nile, na-egosi na nkà na-aga nke ọma ekwesịghị ịga nke ọma na nkà na ụzụ.
orbitalReflector.caption: Ntugharị dijitalụ nke Orbital Reflector, 2018

others.text: Ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe atụnyela aka na ngalaba nka mbara igwe, nke ọ bụla na-eweta echiche pụrụ iche na nyocha ha. Ọrụ ndị a ma ama gụnyere nyocha onye na-ese mbara igwe nke Sarah Jane Pell na-enyocha ọrụ mmadụ na gburugburu ebe dị oke egwu; Agnes Meyer-Brandis's Moon Goose Analogue oru ngo na-enyocha akụkọ nyocha nke mbara igwe na nke dị ugbu a; Mmemme AstroArts nke Nehum na-eme ka nnwale microgravity nka nka; na Arthur Woods's Cosmic Dancer sculpture, ihe ọkpụkpụ mbụ e gosipụtara na mbara igwe n'ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Mir na 1993.

orbitalTemple.text: Na 2025 , mgbe 4 afọ nke nnyocha na mmepe, Brazil omenka Edson Pavoni na a multidisciplinary ìgwè nke collaborators ga-amalite Orbital Temple , a participatory art satellite na-akpọ onye ọ bụla n'ụwa ka o ziga aha na orbit, na-eke a radically gụnyere ncheta gafere ókè.
orbitalTemple.caption: Orbital Temple na Mercosul Bienal. Foto: Clara Marques

imageAlts.artsatInvader: ARTSAT-1 ihe owuwu satịlaịtị onye mbuso agha
imageAlts.artsatArt: Ihe osise emepụtara site na data ARTSAT-1
imageAlts.enoch: Ihe ngosi ENOCH nke Tavares Strachan
